patterns: how many courses are there in this college
responses:
Rustamji Institute of Technology (RJIT) is the first engineering college in India established by Border Security Force in October 1999, 
 B.Tech in IT,B.Tech in CSE,B.Tech in AUTOMOBILE,B.Tech in MECHANICAL,B.Tech in ELECTICAL,B.Tech in ECE,

patterns: how long will be B.Tech course

responses: Our college offers 4 year long BTech course

patterns: what is the location of the college
responses: RJIT is located in Tekanpur, 24 km from Gwalior on Gwalior- Jhansi Road , and 15 km from Dabra

patterns: how many semesters are there in a year
how many semesters one should study in a year
responses: There are two semesters in a year.

patterns: how many months are there in a semester
how long will be a single semester
responses: The single semester will be around 4 months.

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission
responses: for B.Tech, candidate should pass 12th wih PCM with minimum 45%, and JEE mains./n high school marksheet, Higher secendory marksheet, JEE mains scorecard are necessory

patterns: how many classes will be there in a day
responses: There are 6 classes per day. Each class will be of 40 minutes.

patterns: what is the teaching style of this college?
Is the teaching pattern different from other college?
responses: The classes are Theory and Practical,each classroom has multimedia facility
Exams are conducted as per RGPV curruulam , the Examination are conducted by RGPV and/n the marks are given in grade point call CGPA & SGPA
RJIT is open from Monday to Friday 09 am to 4 PM, excepting public holidays

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the college conducts any fun program
responses: RJIT organizes Abhivyanjana every Year along with TechFest and Sportsmeet

patterns: what facilities are provided by the college?
what are the facilities of college for students
responses: With excellent education facilities, Our College provides various other facilities like 24 hours internet, library, classes with AC, discusson room, canteen, parking space, and student service for any students queries.
